remarks:
Restricted quantifier version of ~ 19.21v .  (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-2003.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 30-May-2011.)  Reduce dependencies on axioms.  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 2-Jan-2020.) 

---

 Theorem 19.21 of [Margaris] p. 90 with restricted quantifiers. (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-2003.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 30-May-2011.)
statement:
r19.21v $p |- ( A. x e. A ( ph -> ps ) <-> ( ph -> A. x e. A ps ) ) $.
$d ph x $.
